statements: DELETE FROM blockchain_logs WHERE user_id = 500 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM blockchain_monitoring WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND transaction_type = 'Transfer';
DELETE FROM blockchain_logs WHERE user_id = 500 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.1' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM blockchain_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'transfer';
DELETE FROM security_audit_logs WHERE actor_id = 50 AND action_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious Login' AND status = false;
DELETE FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
